reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These blocks are definitely worth a purchase if your little one is constantly throwing everything they get in their hands. Not only are they sturdy but the magnets inside of them definitely make them more enjoyable for the kids! Overall a solid and good product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gift for my 18 months old grandson
reviews.reviewText: My grandson is 18 months old, I bought him the magnetic blocks for Christmas. They are colorful and durable. He really loves playing with them, the magnet make it very easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for small motor skills.
reviews.reviewText: Colorful, seem durable for our 2 year old nephew.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for toddlers..
reviews.reviewText: my one-year-old granddaughter LOVES these. They are sturdy and colorful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good blocks, different from magnetic tiles
reviews.reviewText: These were good blocks. They are magnetic and fun- I did have to purchase two sets so we could really use them, so I docked a point because they are costly for the amount you get.(But they are fun we creat many little homes for figures with them)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love them (so does my son) but I wish they were a bit bigger or at least that more came in the package. There’s not much you can do with the amount given and they’re a bit pricey but otherwise my son like them and enjoys playing with them still

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way better than plain blocks
reviews.reviewText: My grandson would get so frustrated when he made something if it fell over, he’s two he Loves to play with these blocks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hours of fun, sensory friendly play, great size for little hands
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These magnetic blocks are amazing, excellent for toddlers, as they are big size, not small, they’re also very colorful.There are 24 blocks in four different colors, green, red, yellow, blue, they are about 1.5”, made of durable plastic, perfect for little hands.My granddaughters 5 and 3 years old had a lot of fun playing with them, I know my 20 months old youngest granddaughter will love them too.Really good for sensory friendly play, hours of fun, also great to make kids play together making the models on the little included booklet. Excellent Christmas gift I will be buying two more to give to my granddaughters so they can have their own cause this one stays in my house for when they come to stay with me
